dc_title_s: Passenger Rail Transit Buffer Areas: Prince George's County, Maryland
dc_description_s: This layer shows buffered areas around the location of fixed passenger rail transit lines within Prince George's County, Maryland. The proposed Purple Line, as delineated from MTA's Locally Preferred Alternative, has a 500 foot buffered area around the feature.
dc_creator_sm: The Maryland-National Capital Park & Planning Commission - Prince George's County
